resources.string:
Features to be added: 
	- Trigonometric functions 
	- Decimal numbers 
	- Exponents 
	- History 
 
Changelog 
v0.20 
	- Made numbers on buttons larger 
	- Fixed Up navigation on 'About' screen 
	- Included changelog and versioning on About screen 
	- Added scrolling to 'About' screen 
	- Changed Icon to Red 
	- Included non-functional 'Settings' page 
 
v0.1 
	- Initial release 
	- Fixed basic backend functions and ability to parse multiple argments 
 
	Developed by MB
